    • Constructor Detail

      • Hotels

        public Hotels()
        Creates a new Hotels object. This Hotels object contains an empty ArrayList of Hotel objects.

    • Method Detail

      • makeNewRoom

        public void makeNewRoom(java.lang.String hotelName,
               int roomNumber,
               int capacity)
        Makes a new Room in Hotel with name hotelName.
        Parameters:
        hotelName - The name of the Hotel as a string.
        roomNumber - The number of the Room as an int.
        capacity - The capacity of the Room as an int. This capacity ranges from 1 (single) to 3 (triple).

      • findHotelByName

        public Hotel findHotelByName(java.lang.String hotelName)
        Finds a Hotel with a given name.
        Parameters:
        hotelName - Name of the hotel you want to find as a String.
        Returns:
        the Hotel if found, and null otherwise.

      • checkRoomsAvailable

        public Hotel checkRoomsAvailable(java.lang.String month,
                        int startDate,
                        int duration,
                        int roomsSingle,
                        int roomsDouble,
                        int roomsTriple)
        Checks if any hotel has the required number of rooms available with specified capacities on the given dates. If a hotel is found, that hotel is returned. Otherwise returns null.
        Parameters:
        month - The month that the booking occurs in as a 3-letter String.
        startDate - The date that the booking begins on as an int.
        duration - The duration or length of the booking in days as an int.
        roomsSingle - The number of single rooms to book as an int. A single room is a room with capacity 1.
        roomsDouble - The number of double rooms to book as an int. A double room is a room with capacity 2.
        roomsTriple - The number of triple rooms to book as an int. A triple room is a room with capacity 3.
        Returns:
        a hotel that has the required number of rooms in specified capacities on the given dates, if one is available. Otherwise, returns null.

      • checkChangeAvailable

        public Hotel checkChangeAvailable(java.lang.String month,
                         int startDate,
                         int duration,
                         int roomsSingle,
                         int roomsDouble,
                         int roomsTriple,
                         int bookingID)
        Checks if any hotel has the required number of rooms available with specified capacities on the given dates, ignoring any bookings with the given booking ID. If a hotel is found, that hotel is returned. Otherwise returns null.
        Parameters:
        month - The month that the booking occurs in as a 3-letter String.
        startDate - The date that the booking begins on as an int.
        duration - The duration or length of the booking in days as an int.
        roomsSingle - The number of single rooms to book as an int. A single room is a room with capacity 1.
        roomsDouble - The number of double rooms to book as an int. A double room is a room with capacity 2.
        roomsTriple - The number of triple rooms to book as an int. A triple room is a room with capacity 3.
        bookingID - The booking ID to ignore when checking availabilities as an int.
        Returns:
        a hotel that has the required number of rooms in specified capacities on the given dates, if one is available. Otherwise, returns null.

      • cancelBooking

        public void cancelBooking(int bookingID)
        Cancels any bookings in any hotel with the specified booking ID.
        Parameters:
        bookingID - The ID of the booking that will be cancelled as an int.

      • bookRooms

        public void bookRooms(int bookingID,
             java.lang.String month,
             int startDate,
             int duration,
             int roomsSingle,
             int roomsDouble,
             int roomsTriple)
        Checks to see if the given number of rooms with specified capacities are available within any one hotel. If they are available, the rooms are booked. Otherwise, the function prints out 'Booking rejected'.
        Parameters:
        bookingID - The ID of the booking as an int.
        month - The month of the booking as a 3-letter String.
        startDate - The date the booking begins as an int.
        duration - The length of the booking in days as an int.
        roomsSingle - The number of rooms with capacity 1 (single) to book.
        roomsDouble - The number of rooms with capacity 2 (double) to book.
        roomsTriple - The number of rooms with capacity 3 (triple) to book.

      • changeRooms

        public void changeRooms(int bookingID,
               java.lang.String month,
               int startDate,
               int duration,
               int roomsSingle,
               int roomsDouble,
               int roomsTriple)
        Checks to see if the given number of rooms with specified capacities are available within any one hotel. This function treats bookings with the given booking ID as un-booked. If they are available, the previous bookings are cancelled and the new rooms are booked. Otherwise, the function prints out 'Booking rejected'.
        Parameters:
        bookingID - The ID of the booking to change as an int.
        month - The month of the booking as a 3-letter String.
        startDate - The date the booking begins as an int.
        duration - The length of the booking in days as an int.
        roomsSingle - The number of rooms with capacity 1 (single) to book.
        roomsDouble - The number of rooms with capacity 2 (double) to book.
        roomsTriple - The number of rooms with capacity 3 (triple) to book.
